cards.name: Mysto
cards.description: Mysto is an elusive and mysterious Pokémon found living among the tall towers and ancient walls of castle-like environments. Its wide eyes and pointed ears give off an air of wisdom, while its calm and inquisitive nature reveals a creature that is constantly observing and learning. When threatened, it can use its Nudge ability to quickly dart away or its Mystery Slash ability to surprise opponents with its hidden power. When not using its impressive defensive capabilities, Mysto spends its days taking in the sights and exploring its surroundings, collecting knowledge and slowly growing in power.
cards.image_prompt: Mysto::0 a chibi cute psychic-type pokemon, in a castle environment, violet shadows, anime chibi drawing style, pastel background --niji --ar 3:2

cards.name: Vortexer
cards.description: Vortexer is a mysterious pokemon rarely seen in castle-like environments. Its vibrant violet armor glows and mesmerizes anyone unlucky enough to cross paths with it. It is an expert at manipulating its environment, able to bend the space around it to its will. It is said to spend its days quietly in its castle, imparting its psychic powers on the world and guiding unsuspecting travelers astray.
cards.image_prompt: Vortexer::0 a dynamic psychic-type pokemon::1.8, wearing violet hypnotic armor, in a castle environment, violet shadows, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2
